00179 class EGS_ENVELOPEG_EXPORT EGS_EnvelopeGeometry : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00180 
00181 public:
00182 
00183     EGS_EnvelopeGeometry(EGS_BaseGeometry *G,
00184                          const vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> &geoms, const string &Name = "",
00185                          bool newindexing=false);
00186 
00187     ~EGS_EnvelopeGeometry();
00188 
00189     bool isRealRegion(int ireg) const {
00190         if (ireg < 0 || ireg >= nreg) {
00191             return false;
00192         }
00193         if (ireg < nbase) {
00194             return g->isRealRegion(ireg);
00195         }
00196         int jg, ilocal;
00197         if (new_indexing) {
00198             jg = reg_to_inscr[ireg-nbase];
00199             ilocal = ireg - local_start[jg];
00200         }
00201         else {
00202             jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00203             ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00204         }
00205         return geometries[jg]->isRealRegion(ilocal);
00206     };
00207 
00208     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00209         return g->isInside(x);
00210     };
00211 
00212     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00213         int ireg = g->isWhere(x);
00214         if (ireg < 0) {
00215             return ireg;
00216         }
00217         for (int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00218             int i = geometries[j]->isWhere(x);
00219             if (i >= 0) return new_indexing ? local_start[j] + i :
00220                                    nbase + nmax*j + i;
00221         }
00222         return ireg;
00223     };
00224 
00225     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00226         return isWhere(x);
00227     };
00228 
00229     int medium(int ireg) const {
00230         if (ireg < nbase) {
00231             return g->medium(ireg);
00232         }
00233         int jg, ilocal;
00234         if (new_indexing) {
00235             jg = reg_to_inscr[ireg-nbase];
00236             ilocal = ireg - local_start[jg];
00237         }
00238         else {
00239             jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00240             ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00241         }
00242         return geometries[jg]->medium(ilocal);
00243     };
00244 
00245     int computeIntersections(int ireg, int n, const EGS_Vector &X,
00246                              const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_GeometryIntersections *isections) {
00247         if (n < 1) {
00248             return -1;
00249         }
00250         int ifirst = 0;
00251         EGS_Float t, ttot = 0;
00252         EGS_Vector x(X);
00253         int imed;
00254         if (ireg < 0) {
00255             t = 1e30;
00256             ireg = howfar(ireg,x,u,t,&imed);
00257             if (ireg < 0) {
00258                 return 0;
00259             }
00260             isections[0].t = t;
00261             isections[0].rhof = 1;
00262             isections[0].ireg = -1;
00263             isections[0].imed = -1;
00264             ttot = t;
00265             ++ifirst;
00266             x += u*t;
00267         }
00268         else {
00269             imed = medium(ireg);
00270         }
00271 
00272 
00273         int j = ifirst;
00274         int ij = -1, ig;
00275         while (1) {
00276             if (ireg >= nbase) {
00277                 if (new_indexing) {
00278                     ig = reg_to_inscr[ireg-nbase];
00279                     ij = ireg - local_start[ig];
00280                 }
00281                 else {
00282                     ig = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00283                     ij = ireg - nbase - ig*nmax;
00284                 }
00285             }
00286             isections[j].imed = imed;
00287             isections[j].ireg = ireg;
00288             isections[j].rhof = getRelativeRho(ireg);
00289             if (ireg < nbase) { // in one of the regions of the base geometry
00290                 t = 1e30;
00291                 int ibase = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,&imed);
00292                 ij = -1, ig;
00293                 for (int i=0; i<n_in; i++) {
00294                     int ireg_i = geometries[i]->howfar(-1,x,u,t,&imed);
00295                     if (ireg_i >= 0) {
00296                         ij = ireg_i;
00297                         ig = i;
00298                     }
00299                 }
00300                 ttot += t;
00301                 isections[j++].t = ttot;
00302                 if (ij < 0) {
00303                     ireg = ibase;
00304                 }
00305                 else ireg = new_indexing ? local_start[ig] + ij :
00306                                 nbase + ig*nmax + ij;
00307                 if (ireg < 0) {
00308                     return j;
00309                 }
00310                 if (j >= n) {
00311                     return -1;
00312                 }
00313                 x += u*t;
00314             }
00315             else {
00316                 int iadd = new_indexing ? local_start[ig] : nbase + ig*nmax;
00317                 int nsec = geometries[ig]->computeIntersections(ij,n-j,
00318                            x,u,&isections[j]);
00319                 int nm = nsec >= 0 ? nsec+j : n;
00320                 for (int i=j; i<nm; i++) {
00321                     isections[i].ireg += iadd;
00322                     isections[i].t += ttot;
00323                 }
00324                 if (nsec < 0) {
00325                     return nsec;
00326                 }
00327                 j += nsec;
00328                 if (j >= n) {
00329                     return -1;
00330                 }
00331                 t = isections[j-1].t - ttot;
00332                 x += u*t;
00333                 ttot = isections[j-1].t;
00334                 ireg = g->isWhere(x);
00335                 if (ireg < 0) {
00336                     return j;
00337                 }
00338                 imed = g->medium(ireg);
00339             }
00340         }
00341         return -1;
00342     }
00343 
00344     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00345                               const EGS_Vector &u) {
00346         if (ireg < 0) {
00347             return 0;
00348         }
00349         EGS_Float d;
00350         if (ireg < nbase) {
00351             d = g->howfarToOutside(ireg,x,u);
00352         }
00353         else if (g->regions() == 1) {
00354             d = g->howfarToOutside(0,x,u);
00355         }
00356         else {
00357             int ir = g->isWhere(x);
00358             d = g->howfarToOutside(ir,x,u);
00359         }
00360         return d;
00361     };
00362 
00363     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00364                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed = 0, EGS_Vector *normal = 0) {
00365         if (ireg >= 0) {
00366             // inside.
00367             if (ireg < nbase) {
00368                 // in one of the regions of the base geometry
00369                 // check if we hit a boundary in the base geometry.
00370                 // if we do, newmed and normal get set accordingly.
00371                 int ibase = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00372                 int ij = -1, jg;
00373                 // check if we will enter any of the inscribed geometries
00374                 // before entering a new region in the base geometry.
00375                 for (int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00376                     int ireg_j =
00377                         geometries[j]->howfar(-1,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00378                     if (ireg_j >= 0) {
00379                         // we do. remember the inscribed geometry index
00380                         // and local region
00381                         ij = ireg_j;
00382                         jg = j;
00383                     }
00384                 }
00385                 if (ij < 0) {
00386                     return ibase;
00387                 }
00388                 // ij<0 implies that we have not hit any of the
00389                 // inscribed geometries => return the base geometry index.
00390                 // ij>=0 implies that we entered inscribed geometry
00391                 // jg in its local region ij.
00392                 return new_indexing ? local_start[jg] + ij :
00393                        nbase + jg*nmax + ij;
00394             }
00395             // if here, we are in an inscribed geometry.
00396             // calculate its index (jg) and its local region (ilocal).
00397             int jg, ilocal;
00398             if (new_indexing) {
00399                 jg = reg_to_inscr[ireg-nbase];
00400                 ilocal = ireg-local_start[jg];
00401             }
00402             else {
00403                 jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00404                 ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00405             }
00406             // and then check if we will hit a boundary in this geometry.
00407             int inew = geometries[jg]->howfar(ilocal,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00408             if (inew >= 0) return new_indexing ? local_start[jg] + inew :
00409                                       nbase + jg*nmax + inew;
00410             // inew >= 0 implies that we either stay in the same
00411             // region (inew=ilocal) or we entered a new region
00412             // (inew!=ilocal), which is still inside the inscribed geometry
00413             // inew<0 implies that we have exited the inscribed geometry
00414             // => check to see in which base geometry region we are.
00415             inew = g->isWhere(x+u*t);
00416             if (inew >= 0 && newmed) {
00417                 *newmed = g->medium(inew);
00418             }
00419             return inew;
00420         }
00421         // if here, we are outside the base geometry.
00422         // check to see if we will enter.
00423         int ienter = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00424         if (ienter >= 0) {
00425             // yes, we do. see if we are already inside of one of the
00426             // inscribed geometries.
00427             for (int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00428                 int i = geometries[j]->isWhere(x+u*t);
00429                 if (i >= 0) {
00430                     // yes, we are.
00431                     if (newmed) {
00432                         *newmed = geometries[j]->medium(i);
00433                     }
00434                     return new_indexing ? local_start[j] + i :
00435                            nbase + nmax*j + i;
00436                 }
00437             }
00438         }
00439         return ienter;
00440     };
00441 
00442     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00443         if (ireg >= 0) {
00444             EGS_Float tmin;
00445             if (ireg < nbase) {  // in one of the regions of the base geom.
00446                 tmin = g->hownear(ireg,x);
00447                 for (int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00448                     EGS_Float tj = geometries[j]->hownear(-1,x);
00449                     if (tj < tmin) {
00450                         tmin = tj;
00451                         if (tmin <= 0) {
00452                             return tmin;
00453                         }
00454                     }
00455                 }
00456                 return tmin;
00457             }
00458             int jg, ilocal;
00459             if (new_indexing) {
00460                 jg = reg_to_inscr[ireg-nbase];
00461                 ilocal = ireg-local_start[jg];
00462             }
00463             else {
00464                 jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00465                 ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00466             }
00467             return geometries[jg]->hownear(ilocal,x);
00468         }
00469         return g->hownear(ireg,x);
00470     };
00471 
00472     int getMaxStep() const {
00473         int nstep = g->getMaxStep();
00474         for (int j=0; j<n_in; ++j) {
00475             nstep += geometries[j]->getMaxStep();
00476         }
00477         return nstep+n_in;
00478     };
00479 
00480     bool hasBooleanProperty(int ireg, EGS_BPType prop) const {
00481         if (ireg >= 0 && ireg < nreg) {
00482             if (ireg < nbase) {
00483                 return g->hasBooleanProperty(ireg,prop);
00484             }
00485             int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00486             int ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00487             return geometries[jg]->hasBooleanProperty(ilocal,prop);
00488         }
00489         return false;
00490     };
00491     void setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType) {
00492         setPropertyError("setBooleanProperty()");
00493     };
00494     void addBooleanProperty(int) {
00495         setPropertyError("addBooleanProperty()");
00496     };
00497     void setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType,int,int,int step=1) {
00498         setPropertyError("setBooleanProperty()");
00499     };
00500     void addBooleanProperty(int,int,int,int step=1) {
00501         setPropertyError("addBooleanProperty()");
00502     };
00503 
00504     const string &getType() const {
00505         return type;
00506     };
00507 
00508     void printInfo() const;
00509 
00510     void setRelativeRho(int start, int end, EGS_Float rho);
00511     void setRelativeRho(EGS_Input *);
00512     EGS_Float getRelativeRho(int ireg) const {
00513         if (ireg < 0 || ireg >= nreg) {
00514             return 1;
00515         }
00516         if (ireg < nbase) {
00517             return g->getRelativeRho(ireg);
00518         }
00519         int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00520         return geometries[jg]->getRelativeRho(ireg - nbase - jg*nmax);
00521     };
00522 
00523     virtual void getLabelRegions(const string &str, vector<int> &regs);
00524 
00525 
00526 protected:
00527 
00528     EGS_BaseGeometry *g;           
00529     EGS_BaseGeometry **geometries; 
00530     int              n_in;         
00531     int              nbase,   
00532                      nmax;    
00534     static string    type;    
00535 
00536     bool new_indexing;        
00537     int *reg_to_inscr;        
00538     int *local_start;         
00539 
00546     void setMedia(EGS_Input *,int,const int *);
00547

00550     void setPropertyError(const char *funcname) {
00551         egsFatal("EGS_EnvelopeGeometry::%s: don't use this method\n  Define "
00552                  "properties in the constituent geometries instead\n",
00553                  funcname);
00554     };

00560 
00569 class EGS_ENVELOPEG_EXPORT EGS_FastEnvelope : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00570 
00571 public:
00572 
00573     EGS_FastEnvelope(EGS_BaseGeometry *G,
00574                      const vector<EnvelopeAux *> &fgeoms, const string &Name = "",
00575                      int newindexing=false);
00576 
00577     ~EGS_FastEnvelope();
00578 
00579     bool isRealRegion(int ireg) const {
00580         if (ireg < 0 || ireg >= nreg) {
00581             return false;
00582         }
00583         if (ireg < nbase) {
00584             return g->isRealRegion(ireg);
00585         }
00586         int jg, ilocal;
00587         if (new_indexing) {
00588             jg = reg_to_inscr[ireg-nbase];
00589             ilocal = ireg - local_start[jg];
00590         }
00591         else {
00592             jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00593             ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00594         }
00595         return geometries[jg]->isRealRegion(ilocal);
00596     };
00597 
00598     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00599         return g->isInside(x);
00600     };
00601 
00602     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00603         int ireg = g->isWhere(x);
00604         if (ireg < 0 || n_start[ireg] < 0) {
00605             return ireg;
00606         }
00607         for (int jj=n_start[ireg]; jj<n_start[ireg+1]; jj++) {
00608             int j = glist[jj];
00609             int i = geometries[j]->isWhere(x);
00610             if (i >= 0) {
00611                 return nbase + nmax*j + i;
00612             }
00613         }
00614         return ireg;
00615     };
00616 
00617     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00618         return isWhere(x);
00619     };
00620 
00621     int medium(int ireg) const {
00622         if (ireg < nbase) {
00623             return g->medium(ireg);
00624         }
00625         int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00626         int ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00627         return geometries[jg]->medium(ilocal);
00628     };
00629 
00630     int computeIntersections(int ireg, int n, const EGS_Vector &X,
00631                              const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_GeometryIntersections *isections) {
00632         if (n < 1) {
00633             return -1;
00634         }
00635         int ifirst = 0;
00636         EGS_Float t, ttot = 0;
00637         EGS_Vector x(X);
00638         int imed;
00639         //egsInformation("computeIntersections: ireg=%d x=(%g,%g,%g) "
00640         //     "u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",ireg,x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z);
00641         if (ireg < 0) {
00642             t = 1e30;
00643             ireg = howfar(ireg,x,u,t,&imed);
00644             if (ireg < 0) {
00645                 return 0;
00646             }
00647             isections[0].t = t;
00648             isections[0].rhof = 1;
00649             isections[0].ireg = -1;
00650             isections[0].imed = -1;
00651             ttot = t;
00652             ++ifirst;
00653             x += u*t;
00654             //egsInformation("entered after t=%g in ireg=%d at x=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00655             //        t,ireg,x.x,x.y,x.z);
00656         }
00657         else {
00658             imed = medium(ireg);
00659         }
00660 
00661 
00662         int j = ifirst;
00663         int ij = -1, ig;
00664         while (1) {
00665             //egsInformation("in loop: j=%d ireg=%d imed=%d x=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00666             //        j,ireg,imed,x.x,x.y,x.z);
00667             if (ireg >= nbase) {
00668                 ig = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00669                 ij = ireg - nbase - ig*nmax;
00670             }
00671             isections[j].imed = imed;
00672             isections[j].ireg = ireg;
00673             isections[j].rhof = getRelativeRho(ireg);
00674             if (ireg < nbase) { // in one of the regions of the base geometry
00675                 t = 1e30;
00676                 int ibase = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,&imed);
00677                 //egsInformation("In base geometry: t=%g inew=%d\n",t,ibase);
00678                 ij = -1, ig;
00679                 for (int ii=n_start[ireg]; ii<n_start[ireg+1]; ii++) {
00680                     int i = glist[ii];
00681                     int ireg_i = geometries[i]->howfar(-1,x,u,t,&imed);
00682                     if (ireg_i >= 0) {
00683                         ij = ireg_i;
00684                         ig = i;
00685                     }
00686                 }
00687                 ttot += t;
00688                 isections[j++].t = ttot;
00689                 //egsInformation("after inscribed loop: t=%g ij=%d ig=%d"
00690                 //      " ttot=%g\n",t,ij,ig,ttot);
00691                 if (ij < 0) {
00692                     ireg = ibase;
00693                 }
00694                 else {
00695                     ireg = nbase + ig*nmax + ij;
00696                 }
00697                 if (ireg < 0) {
00698                     return j;
00699                 }
00700                 if (j >= n) {
00701                     return -1;
00702                 }
00703                 x += u*t;
00704             }
00705             else {
00706                 int iadd = nbase + ig*nmax;
00707                 int nsec = geometries[ig]->computeIntersections(ij,n-j,
00708                            x,u,&isections[j]);
00709                 //egsInformation("In inscribed %d: got %d intersections\n",ig,
00710                 //        nsec);
00711                 int nm = nsec >= 0 ? nsec+j : n;
00712                 for (int i=j; i<nm; i++) {
00713                     isections[i].ireg += iadd;
00714                     isections[i].t += ttot;
00715                 }
00716                 //egsInformation("last intersection: %g\n",isections[nm-1].t);
00717                 if (nsec < 0) {
00718                     return nsec;
00719                 }
00720                 j += nsec;
00721                 if (j >= n) {
00722                     return -1;
00723                 }
00724                 t = isections[j-1].t - ttot;
00725                 x += u*t;
00726                 ttot = isections[j-1].t;
00727                 ireg = g->isWhere(x);
00728                 //egsInformation("new region: %d\n",ireg);
00729                 if (ireg < 0) {
00730                     return j;
00731                 }
00732                 imed = g->medium(ireg);
00733             }
00734         }
00735         return -1;
00736     }
00737 
00738     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00739                               const EGS_Vector &u) {
00740         if (ireg < 0) {
00741             return 0;
00742         }
00743         EGS_Float d;
00744         if (ireg < nbase) {
00745             d = g->howfarToOutside(ireg,x,u);
00746         }
00747         else if (g->regions() == 1) {
00748             d = g->howfarToOutside(0,x,u);
00749         }
00750         else {
00751             int ir = g->isWhere(x);
00752             d = g->howfarToOutside(ir,x,u);
00753         }
00754         return d;
00755     };
00756 
00757     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00758                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed = 0, EGS_Vector *normal = 0) {
00759         if (ireg >= 0) {
00760             // inside.
00761             if (ireg < nbase) {
00762                 // in one of the regions of the base geometry
00763                 // check if we hit a boundary in the base geometry.
00764                 // if we do, newmed and normal get set accordingly.
00765                 int ibase = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00766                 int ij = -1, jg;
00767                 // check if we will enter any of the inscribed geometries
00768                 // before entering a new region in the base geometry.
00769                 for (int jj=n_start[ireg]; jj<n_start[ireg+1]; jj++) {
00770                     int j = glist[jj];
00771                     int ireg_j =
00772                         geometries[j]->howfar(-1,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00773                     if (ireg_j >= 0) {
00774                         // we do. remember the inscribed geometry index
00775                         // and local region
00776                         ij = ireg_j;
00777                         jg = j;
00778                     }
00779                 }
00780                 if (ij < 0) {
00781                     return ibase;
00782                 }
00783                 // ij<0 implies that we have not hit any of the
00784                 // inscribed geometries => return the base geometry index.
00785                 // ij>=0 implies that we entered inscribed geometry
00786                 // jg in its local region ij.
00787                 return nbase + jg*nmax + ij;
00788             }
00789             // if here, we are in an inscribed geometry.
00790             // calculate its index (jg) and its local region (ilocal).
00791             int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00792             int ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00793             // and then check if we will hit a boundary in this geometry.
00794             int inew = geometries[jg]->howfar(ilocal,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00795             if (inew >= 0) {
00796                 return nbase + jg*nmax + inew;
00797             }
00798             // inew >= 0 implies that we either stay in the same
00799             // region (inew=ilocal) or we entered a new region
00800             // (inew!=ilocal), which is still inside the inscribed geometry
00801             // inew<0 implies that we have exited the inscribed geometry
00802             // => check to see in which base geometry region we are.
00803             inew = g->isWhere(x+u*t);
00804             if (inew >= 0 && newmed) {
00805                 *newmed = g->medium(inew);
00806             }
00807             return inew;
00808         }
00809         // if here, we are outside the base geometry.
00810         // check to see if we will enter.
00811         int ienter = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00812         if (ienter >= 0) {
00813             // yes, we do. see if we are already inside of one of the
00814             // inscribed geometries.
00815             //if( n_start[ienter] < 0 ) return ienter;
00816             for (int jj=n_start[ienter]; jj<n_start[ienter+1]; jj++) {
00817                 int j = glist[jj];
00818                 int i = geometries[j]->isWhere(x+u*t);
00819                 if (i >= 0) {
00820                     // yes, we are.
00821                     if (newmed) {
00822                         *newmed = geometries[j]->medium(i);
00823                     }
00824                     return nbase + nmax*j + i;
00825                 }
00826             }
00827         }
00828         return ienter;
00829     };
00830 
00831     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00832         if (ireg >= 0) {
00833             EGS_Float tmin;
00834             if (ireg < nbase) {  // in one of the regions of the base geom.
00835                 tmin = g->hownear(ireg,x);
00836                 if (tmin <= 0) {
00837                     return tmin;
00838                 }
00839                 for (int jj=n_start[ireg]; jj<n_start[ireg+1]; jj++) {
00840                     int j = glist[jj];
00841                     EGS_Float tj = geometries[j]->hownear(-1,x);
00842                     if (tj < tmin) {
00843                         tmin = tj;
00844                         if (tmin <= 0) {
00845                             return tmin;
00846                         }
00847                     }
00848                 }
00849                 return tmin;
00850             }
00851             int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00852             int ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00853             return geometries[jg]->hownear(ilocal,x);
00854         }
00855         return g->hownear(ireg,x);
00856     };
00857 
00858     bool hasBooleanProperty(int ireg, EGS_BPType prop) const {
00859         if (ireg >= 0 && ireg < nreg) {
00860             if (ireg < nbase) {
00861                 return g->hasBooleanProperty(ireg,prop);
00862             }
00863             int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00864             int ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00865             return geometries[jg]->hasBooleanProperty(ilocal,prop);
00866         }
00867         return false;
00868     };
00869     void setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType) {
00870         setPropertyError("setBooleanProperty()");
00871     };
00872     void addBooleanProperty(int) {
00873         setPropertyError("addBooleanProperty()");
00874     };
00875     void setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType,int,int,int step=1) {
00876         setPropertyError("setBooleanProperty()");
00877     };
00878     void addBooleanProperty(int,int,int,int step=1) {
00879         setPropertyError("addBooleanProperty()");
00880     };
00881 
00882     int getMaxStep() const {
00883         int nstep = g->getMaxStep();
00884         for (int j=0; j<n_in; ++j) {
00885             nstep += geometries[j]->getMaxStep();
00886         }
00887         return nstep+n_in;
00888     };
00889 
00890     const string &getType() const {
00891         return type;
00892     };
00893 
00894     void printInfo() const;
00895 
00896     void setRelativeRho(int start, int end, EGS_Float rho);
00897     void setRelativeRho(EGS_Input *);
00898     EGS_Float getRelativeRho(int ireg) const {
00899         if (ireg < 0 || ireg >= nreg) {
00900             return 1;
00901         }
00902         if (ireg < nbase) {
00903             return g->getRelativeRho(ireg);
00904         }
00905         int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00906         return geometries[jg]->getRelativeRho(ireg - nbase - jg*nmax);
00907     };

00909     virtual void getLabelRegions(const string &str, vector<int> &regs);

00914     EGS_BaseGeometry *g;           
00915     EGS_BaseGeometry **geometries;

00917     int              nbase,   
00918                      nmax;    
00920     int              *glist;
00921     int              *n_start;
00922     static string    type;

00938     void setPropertyError(const char *funcname) {
00939         egsFatal("EGS_FastEnvelope::%s: don't use this method\n  Define "
00940                  "properties in the constituent geometries instead\n",
00941                  funcname);
00942     };
